name: CC MQTT v5 Client Filter
desc:
This filter provides MQTT v5 transport management for the used protocol.

Supports inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "mqtt5.client": "client_id" } - Update configured client id.
    { "mqtt5.username": "username" } - Update configured username.
    { "mqtt5.password": "password" } - Update configured password. Prefix hex bytes with '\x'.
    { "mqtt5.pub_topic": "pub_topic" } - Update default publish topic.
    { "mqtt5.pub_qos": 1 } - Update default publish QoS.
    { "mqtt5.resp_topic": "resp_topic" } - Update default response topic.
    { "mqtt5.subscribes": [
        {
            "topic": "some/topic", - Subscribe topic.
            "qos": 2, - Subscribe max QoS.
            "no_local": false, - No local.
            "retain_as_published": false, - Retain as published.
            "retain_handling": 1 - Retain handling.
    ] } - Add or update subscribes
    { "mqtt5.subscribes_remove": [
        {
            "topic": "some/topic" - Subscribe topic.
    ] } - Remove subscribes
    { "mqtt5.subscribes_clear": true } - Clear all subscribes.
    { "mqtt.client": "client_id" } - Alias to "mqtt5.client".
    { "mqtt.username": "username" } - Alias to "mqtt5.username".
    { "mqtt.password": "password" } - Alias to "mqtt5.password".
    { "mqtt.pub_topic": "pub_topic" } - Alias to "mqtt5.pub_topic".
    { "mqtt.pub_qos": 1 } - Alias to "mqtt5.pub_qos".
    { "mqtt.resp_topic": "resp_topic" } - Alias to "mqtt5.resp_topic".
    { "mqtt.subscribes": [...] - Alias to "mqtt5.subscribes". 
    { "mqtt.subscribes_remove": [...] - Alias to "mqtt5.subscribes_remove". 
    { "mqtt.subscribes_clear": true } - Alias to "mqtt5.subscribes_clear". 

Supported message overriding properties:
    { "mqtt5.topic": "some/topic" } - Override publish topic
    { "mqtt5.qos": 1 } - Override publish QoS
    { "mqtt5.retained": true } - Send retained message
    { "mqtt5.format": 1 } - Set content format
    { "mqtt5.expiry_interval": 10 } - Set message expiry interval
    { "mqtt5.response_topic": "some/topic" } - Set response topic
    { "mqtt5.content_type": "some_content_type" } - Set content type
    { "mqtt5.correlation_data": "0123456789abcdef" } - Set hex bytes of the correlation data
    { "mqtt5.user_props": [{"key": "key1", "value": "value1" }, ...] - Set user properties
    { "mqtt.topic": "some/topic" } - Alias to "mqtt5.topic".
    { "mqtt.qos": 1 } - Alias to "mqtt5.qos".
    { "mqtt.retained": true } - Alias to "mqtt5.retained".
